answers.answer: Hi there!Diabetes control can be achieved by diet control, adjustment of medication dosage and/ or lifestyle changes such as regular exercise etc. It would be difficult to suggest something without knowing the primary details regarding the same. It would be best to get in touch with his treating endocrinologist/ nutritionist for adequate sugar control.Hope this helps.Take care!
